character_name: Maximus Decimus Meridius: A Hispano-Roman legatus forced into becoming a slave who seeks revenge against Commodus. He has earned the favor of Marcus Aurelius
Lucilla: Maximus's former lover and the older child of Marcus Aurelius. Lucilla has been recently widowed. She resists her brother's incestuous advances
Senator Gracchus: A member of the Roman Senate who opposes Commodus's rule and an ally of Lucilla and Maximus. In the original film script
Juba: A Numidian tribesman who was taken from his home and family by slave traders. He becomes Maximus's closest ally and friend
Marcus Aurelius: The old and wise emperor of Rome who appoints Maximus

Hagen: A Germanic warrior and Proximo's chief gladiator who later befriends Maximus and Juba during their battles in Rome. He is killed by the Praetorian Guard during Maximus's attempted escape from Rome.
Cicero: Maximus's loyal servant who provides liaison between the enslaved Maximus
Senator Gaius: A Roman senator allied with Gracchus
Lucius Verus: The young son of Lucilla. He is named after his father Lucius Verus
Cassius: The master of ceremonies for the gladiatorial games in the Colosseum.
Tigris of Gaul. The only undefeated Gladiator
